snippet: The editor, Mahmudur Rahman, was charged with sedition at a time when strikes by opposition forces have frozen travel and are crippling the country’s economy.
abstract: Police in Bangladesh arrest Mahmudur Rahman, editor of opposition newspaper Amar Desh, and charge him with several offenses, including sedition.
lead_paragraph: The editor, Mahmudur Rahman, was charged with sedition at a time when strikes by opposition forces have frozen travel and are crippling the country’s economy.

headline.seo: Bangladesh Police Arrest Acting Editor of Pro-Opposition Paper
headline.main: Bangladesh Police Arrest Acting Editor of Pro-Opposition Paper
headline.print_headline: Bangladesh: Editor of Pro-Opposition Paper Is Arrested
